This is a guide for the generating a network from a mixture of multy-layers.

```{r setup message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse,tidygraph)
```

```{r}
tidygraph::create_ring(10) -> a
a %>% plot()
```
